name: Catagonia Ltd.
tag_list: online-technology, software, tech, vc, seed, mobile, early-stage, internet
overview:
We invest in software and service companies that make use of online and mobile technologies. In so doing, we rely on disruptive business ideas with the potential to redefine established markets. We actively support our founding teams with resources and comprehensive knowledge.

We also apply our experiences to founding our own new companies in the areas of mobile Internet, social and local network applications, as well as other online business models.

In addition, we provide support to established companies and corporations in expanding their business in strategically significant technology and Internet areas. With the foundation of spin-ins, corporate start-ups with innovative business models, we help parent companies achieve greater long-term growth through innovation.

Catagonia Capital GmbH was founded in 2008 by entrepreneur and investor Ralph Eric Kunz.
